rows.label: qst200402_msg0001
rows.name: Everything okay? Are you hurt?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0002
rows.name: Y-yes, I mean, no, I mean... I'm fine.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0003
rows.name: Thank you ever so much for your help.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0004
rows.name: Can I just ask, what was their deal?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0005
rows.name: They, ah, came to collect on a loan...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0006
rows.name:
One day at work, I accidentally caused
a wealthy patron to be injured.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0007
rows.name:
They made me cover the
medical fees, which put
me in significant debt...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0008
rows.name:
The person I borrowed from
was not a nice man, and the
interest kept mounting up...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0009
rows.name:
I gave them everything I earned,
but still my debt kept increasing.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0010
rows.name:
Right, right... That explains why
those goons were all over you.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0011
rows.name:
If this keeps up, I won't
have enough to live on,
much less pay them back...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't know what the point
of living is, anymore...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't talk like that! It
sure as hell beats dying,
I can tell you that much.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah, what Nia said.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0015
rows.name:
While there's life, there's
hope... Or something like that.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0016
rows.name: It's too soon to give up just yet.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0017
rows.name:
Exactly. We'll do what we can
to help you repay the debt.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0018
rows.name: You would...? Thank you, oh, thank you!

rows.label: qst200402_msg0019
rows.name:
For now, you should probably
go home and rest. You're
looking a bit pale...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0020
rows.name: Okay. If you think that's best...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0031
rows.name:
I live close by here. Please, do let
me know if you learn anything...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0032
rows.name: Yeah, leave it to us.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0033
rows.name:
Thank you, once again...
Be well, friends.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0021
rows.name:
...Right. Now then. Shall we ask
around about this loan shark person?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0022
rows.name: ...Would you mind waiting a moment?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0023
rows.name: What's up, Vasara?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0024
rows.name: My intuition tells me...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0025
rows.name:
...that this is no simple
dispute among civilians. I
feel there is more at play...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0026
rows.name:
I wish to be part of
this investigation.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0027
rows.name:
This is quite something,
coming from you, Vasara.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0028
rows.name:
Why not? Let's split up
and search for clues.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0029
rows.name:
And once we've asked around, let's
meet back up at Ellenora's. Okay?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0030
rows.name: Understood.
